data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Saramacca, Suriname.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saramacca, Suriname
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Saramacca with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Saramacca unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Saramacca to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Jew, Dutch people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Saramacca, Suriname that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Saramacca, Suriname to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.section_summary:
the state of Saramacca, Suriname has a population of 16,200.

We estimate Saramacca has 2,775 people who might know Jesus, 4,776 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 8,650 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 16,200 citizens of the the state of Saramacca.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

location.name: Saramacca

location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Surinamese, Dutch-speaking (1,500), Carib, Galibi (3,200), Han Chinese, Cantonese (6,800), Arab, Syrian (1,200), Indonesian (19,000)
